name: SpeedHook! BTP JAM GAME
description:
DISCLAIMERS: GAME HASN’T BEEN TESTED FOR WINDOWS

A BUG DISCOVERED AFTER DEADLINE MEANS THE POINT SCREEN CANNOT BE REACHED. IF YOU ARE FINE TO USE YOUR OWN TIMER, THEN THE EQUATION IS: POINTS = 24,000 - SECONDS *100. 

This Game Fits the Theme Because: Less time in the levels means more points, and the art style uses the philosophy less colours leads to more striking visuals.

What is Speedhook?

SpeedHook is a fun platformer, with a focus on providing a fun and deep speedrunning experience...

Where you play as a little character,with A GRAPPLING HOOK.

What's This? YOU CAN PHASE THROUGH WALLS!

the developer is definetely not too lazy too fix a bug,its a feature ok?

My basic Platformer code is on my itch.io page, check it out too!It’s basic code was inspired (not ripped from, I rewrote it, and changed the variables a lot (duh)). I used RealTutsGML grappling hook tutorial as a starting point for writing the grapple system, with a changes and tweaks made to make it work better with some different movement code, and the newer version of GMS2.

                             Other than that, we made everything from scratch

  • Wall Jump Games is responsible for the the engine stuff
  • TotallyJustMagic is responsible for the art
  •  Yazorius  is responsible for the song,techically 2 songs? 

but one isn't in the game... or is it?

Disclaimer: Game has not been tested for Windows, please tell me if there are any major bugs.
